item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Summoned Fayt and crippled before update went live today, however:

Stat: Gen
Diff: 11
Message: Ancient Heroes show up demanding that you be their master!

Attack: Your Prana is drained! XX Stamina lost!

Defeat: You kill them so much that they die!

Sorry that I can't update it myself yet.

Also - We have been going through the summons and just finished Astaroth the other day, and now summoned Fayt this morning. Not sure if the summon order of the new final four will be random or not, but Fayt was the first one we got.
